attributes.action: scrap tuition fees for university students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the tuition fee makes university unobtainable for people from less well off backgrounds and creates debts of between £5000, and £30,000, it is unfair that graduates should be entering the working world with so much debt. scrapping tuition fees will also make England like Scotland where university is FREE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
